aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Description of all needed information to place a market place offer on the marketplace.

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Description of all needed information to place a market place offer on the marketplace.
Stock Keeping Unit is an unique identifier of the dealer providing the product.
The available quantity of the on the offered product in SKU.
The unit of measure (related to quantity).
The condition of the offered product.
The longitude of the 2D sphere coordinates.
The latitude of the 2D sphere coordinates.
The incoterms.
The absolute value of the price.
The currency of the price.
Image file of the object.
Name or title of the object.
Location of the object.
attachment for the article.
Name or title of the object.
Location of the object.
If this is a single product or a lot of products (group) not being necessarly of the same part number.
The status of the offer.
Certificates related to the product.
Certificates that come with the product in the listing.
Name or title of the object.
Location of the object.
The number of the certificate.
The issue of the certificate.
Year the certificate was published.
Year the certificate was published.
The date the certificate becomes effective.
The date the certificate expires.
The description of the product on the marketplace.
The brandname of the offered product.
The original manufacturer of a product.
The unique identifier of the product from the manufacturer.
A link to either the product on the original marketplace/webshop or a link to the product specifications document.
The original equipment number.
Further technical specifications.
The key of the key value pair.
The value of the key value pair.
Completeness of the product, e.g. missing parts are not acceptable.
Information on whether the product has been dismantled.
Information on mechanical damage to the part, e.g. two broken ribs or part deformation indicate mechanical damage.
Information on whether the product has corrosion.
Information on whether the product has been discoloured.
The availability date when the product is in stock.
The mileage the item was ins use.
Information on whether the product has been fired and suffered damage from heat.
Description of all needed information to place a market place offer on the marketplace.
